headline: Why Did Warren Buffett Invest In Gillette But Not In Estee Lauder And E.L.F. Beauty?
summary: Explore why Warren Buffett and Charlie Munger steered clear of Cosmetics giants like Estee Lauder and e.l.f despite their Gillette-like traits.

raw.headline: Why Did Warren Buffett Invest In Gillette But Not In Estee Lauder And E.L.F. Beauty?

headline: Estée Lauder Announces Dr. Matthew Walker as Brand’s First-Ever Global Sleep Science Advisor
summary: NEW YORK, March 10, 2025--Estée Lauder today announces that it has signed Dr. Matthew Walker, PhD, as the brand’s first-ever Global Sleep Science Advisor, leveraging his expertise to deepen Estée Lauder’s nighttime skincare research and innovation, while tapping into the global sleep movement to educate consumers on the vital connection between sleep and health.

raw.headline: Estée Lauder Announces Dr. Matthew Walker as Brand’s First-Ever Global Sleep Science Advisor

headline: Can EL Stock Bounce Back in Fiscal 2025 Amid Challenges?
summary: The Estee Lauder Companies focuses on its transformation plan to drive growth despite challenges in key markets and rising costs.
